result.eng: Some people never stop laughing at them.

result.eng: It was bad of us not be grateful to him.

result.eng: 'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ga: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.orig: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.html: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ag teaċt faoinár ndéin liúiġ duine de na fir óga agus ḃí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.

result.eng: He had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.
result.ga: Bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iad
result.orig: Bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iad
result.html: Bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iadHe had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé de ṁisneaċ aige t-léinte a ċaiṫeaṁ a ḃí ċoṁ teann sin go mbeaḋ eagla ort go bpollfaḋ a ḋidíní iadHe had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.

result.eng: She still felt nauseous from the incident.

result.eng: "What's wrong with you?" called Norma-Jean when Rebekka chucked the bowl into the sink.
result.ga: Cad atá cearr leat a scairt Norma-Jean nuair a chaith Rebekka an babhla isteach sa doirteal de ráig
result.orig: Cad atá cearr leat a scairt Norma-Jean nuair a chaith Rebekka an babhla isteach sa doirteal de ráig

result.ponchtml: Cad atá cearr leat a scairt Norma-Jean nuair a ċaiṫ Rebekka an baḃla isteaċ sa doirteal de ráig"What's wrong with you?" called Norma-Jean when Rebekka chucked the bowl into the sink.

result.eng: In the dark world of espionage, you cannot be sure of anything.
result.ga: I saol dorcha na spiaireachta ní féidir bheith cinnte de rud ar bith

result.ponchtml: I saol dorċa na spiaireaċta ní féidir ḃeiṫ cinnte de rud ar biṫIn the dark world of espionage, you cannot be sure of anything.

result.eng: It overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
result.ga: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fada
result.orig: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fada
result.html: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fadaIt overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ sé cuid ṁaiṫ de na faḋbanna seaċadta agus roċtana a ḃíoḋ ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fadaIt overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.

result.eng: Because of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
result.ga: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais
result.orig: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais
result.html: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costaisBecause of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
result.ponchtml: De ḃarr na ḃforbairtí seo ḃí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránaċ a ṫug deis dó feiḋmiú mar iriseoir ar ḃonn doṁanda agus ar ḃeagán costaisBecause of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.

result.eng: You didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.

result.orig: Ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadh

result.eng: Apart from the odd blog here and there, most of the sites are only rarely updated.

result.eng: Most of the country's businesses are in private ownership.

result.eng: By the year 1776 slavery was ended in many of the northern states.

result.eng: By 1865, owning people was against the law in each of the United States.
